thread.title: Missing Dunedin man Scott Brogan last seen in Alexandra
thread.title_full: Missing Dunedin man Scott Brogan last seen in Alexandra

author: Rhys Chamberlain
title: Missing Dunedin man Scott Brogan last seen in Alexandra
text:
Missing Dunedin man Scott Brogan last seen in Alexandra RHYS CHAMBERLAIN Last updated 14:50, February 7 2017 
Dunedin man Scott Brogan went missing from Alexandra on Monday morning. 
A missing Dunedin man's family have no idea why he "wandered off" and are worried for his safety. 
Scott Brogan, 33, went missing from Alexandra in the early hours of Monday morning, police confirmed. 
Brogan's former partner, who preferred not to be named, said his disappearance from the Dunstan Rd area between midnight and 12.30am was out of character. 
"He's missing and no one knows why he wandered off but he did. 
READ MORE: 
"Everyone went to bed and that was it. That's the last time he was seen. 
"It's so difficult." 
Brogan was in the Alexandra area visiting family, she said. 
The family had contacted everyone they knew in the Alexandra and Dunedin areas without success. 
There was a possibility he could also be in the Christchurch area as he had a child that lived there, the former partner said. Ad Feedback 
A Facebook post from Brogan's sister said the family were "dealing with [it] the best way we can". 
The post described Brogan as being of slim build with tattoos on both arms and wearing jeans and a hoodie. 
Anyone with information should contact Alexandra police on 03 440 2500.
